attributes.action: restrict speed-limited HGVs from overtaking on motorways and dual carriageways
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Under European law, all HGVs are speed-limited to 90kph (56mph). However, not all speed-limiters are equal and this results in a 56mph moving roadblock as one HGV overtakes another with only a 0.5 mph speed differential between them.
By preventing HGVs from overtaking on motorways and dual carriageways, a major source of restriction would be removed resulting in a more constant speed for the remainder of traffic. This would reduce congestion, decrease travel time and decrease vehicle emissions.
